Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Bill Anderson', 'Bille Eltringham', 'Dan Reed', 'Maurice Phillips', 'Richard Spence', 'Stuart Orme'], 'Producers': ['Chris Burt', 'Damien Timmer', 'Michele Buck', 'Rebecca Eaton', 'Ted Childs'], 'Starring': ['Clare Holman', 'Kevin Whately', 'Laurence Fox'], 'Studio': ['PBS']}
Review Text: Great production with fantastic actors and acting. Love the locations and scenery. Plots are well executed. Character studies are well executed and add to the plot's intrigue. Love how everything all weaves together in the end.
Review Title: Great Mystery Series
Rating: 5.0
